BR_text.BRsummary: Build error: "‘cv’ does not name a type" with USE_OPENCV = 0
BR_text.BRdescription:
While building from source, an error:
 <denchmark-code>src/io/image_det_aug_default.cc:18:14: error: ‘cv’ does not name a type
  using Rect = cv::Rect_<float>;
               ^
 Makefile:207: recipe for target 'build/src/io/image_det_aug_default.o' failed
 make: *** [build/src/io/image_det_aug_default.o] Error 1
 
 </denchmark-code>
 
 is thrown.
 This is weired because USE_OPENCV = 0 in config.mk.
 <denchmark-h:h2>Environment info</denchmark-h>
 
 Operating System:
 Ubuntu 16.04
 Or if installed from source:
 MXNet commit hash ():
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/commit/911f7474deafc3cc95a2589b89432f94f22cbbe1>911f747</denchmark-link>
 
 <denchmark-h:h2>Error Message:</denchmark-h>
 
 src/io/image_det_aug_default.cc:18:14: error: ‘cv’ does not name a type
 using Rect = cv::Rect_;
 ^
 Makefile:207: recipe for target 'build/src/io/image_det_aug_default.o' failed
 make: *** [build/src/io/image_det_aug_default.o] Error 1
 <denchmark-h:h2>Minimum reproducible example</denchmark-h>
 
 Easily reproducible by following the step by step below on a newly installed ubuntu 16.04 without opencv.
 <denchmark-h:h2>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
 
 
 git clone --recursive https://github.com/dmlc/mxnet.git
 cd mxnet/
 emacs make/config.mk -> change USE_OPENCV = 1 to USE_OPENCV = 0
 make -j8
 
 It compiled fine on the same system with the same configuration with mxnet version <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/commit/2735414c9f55e3e33d7eeb0c0293e0175e2644d6>2735414</denchmark-link>

comments_1.comment_text: any quickfix? i cannot continue when i cannot compile...
